channel.title: Tor Browser asks to set Security Slider to Maximum at every Qubes DispVM Startup
channel.description: Every time Tor Browser is opened in a fresh DispVM, it asks whether to set slider to safest. This is understandable although it is not needed every single time. Is there a config option which can be set in the TemplateVM to disable this prompt from reappearing? Thank you.

item.title: Tor Browser asks to set Security Slider to Maximum at every Qubes DispVM Startup
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Waiting for the following feature request to be implemented so this can be improved.

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: Qubes start menu - add support for show only in DispVM - OnlyShowIn=X-QUBES-DispVM;

opened by adrelanos on 2019-08-18 
As discussed in https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/qubes-devel/DEQNltD2_kc upcoming change in tb-starter:
add Tor Browser first startup popup to ask whether security slider should be set...
